message: lol

I found out they fed my newborn a bottle of formula and """"some sugar water"""" right after delivery (had a c-section) even though I asked them to bring the baby to me for feeding, which I was completely able to do although inexperienced. Also, I asked for BF support the second day, but was told the woman was not available that day. Took a few tries but my baby & I finally figured it out on our own. A lot of stress could have been avoided with just a little support.
